sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <Navbar :category="category" />
    <Carousel :category="category"/>
    <router-view :categories="category"></router-view>
    <!-- <Footer/> -->
  </section>
</template>

    <script>
    import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
    // import Footer from './components/Footer.vue';
    import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
    import Carousel from './components/Carousel.vue';
    export default {
      data() {
        return {
          category:null
        }
      },
      components:{
        Navbar,Carousel
      },
      methods: {
      },
      mounted(){
        console.log("as");
        try{
        const res = fetch("/db.json");
        const data = res.json();
        this.category = data;
        console.log(this.category);
      } catch(err){
        console.error("Veri alınamadı", err);
      }
      }
    }
    </script>

<style>
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

#categoryCarousel{
  display: grid;
}
.hero-img {
  object-fit: cover;
  max-height: 700px;
  width: 100vw;
}
a {
  text-decoration: none;
  max-height: 100px;
  font-size: 18px;
}
i {
  font-size: 25px;
}

</style>
